publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4769# Karen Whitefield: Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Lineâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the progress of the Airdrie-Bathgate Railway and Linked Improvements Bill; recognises the benefits which the project will bring to the towns of Coatbridge, Airdrie, Bathgate and Livingston as well as the surrounding communities; further recognises the importance of the Bill in enabling improved educational, employment and recreational opportunities to people within these communities, and looks forward to the successful completion of the Bill and the building of the rail line.
S2M-4769# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 8 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4769# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 8 September 2006) Helen Eadie*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Bristow Muldoon*, Karen Gillon*, Chris Ballance*, Michael McMahon*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Fiona Hyslop*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Bill Butler*, Robin Harper*, John Swinburne*, Christine May*
S2M-4769# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 8 September 2006) Cathie Craigie*
S2M-4769# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 8 September 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4769# Airdrie to Bathgate Rail Line (lodged on 8 September 2006) Margaret Mitchell*
